NEXT
SKIP
GOT IT
It\'s basically an app for advertising information, products and all types of services to users in the app from across the country.
Tap, View And Go
AdCafé
Basically you can charge advertisers for your time to view their ads in the app and also advertise your product to the app\'s users.
Hello!
Take a Tour
We want to make advertising cool; We believe that the adCafe can do just that, and do it in a way that is effective, interesting and maybe, just maybe, entertaining.
Your attention has value to advertisers. Here you can charge them for it, making money in the process.
Even better! Among many other benefits, the AdCafe gives you the ability to target many of its users in a very short period of time.
Not quite yet! First you\'ll need to know how to use the app and for that we\'ve prepared a short tutorial on how you will interact with it.
Now the main page will look something like this. We will go over what everything is and what everything does.
The advert banners will be hosted in cards looking like this. The centre to top part is where the banner will be.
Below the banner are some buttons which should help you to perform some actions on the ad.
At the top of the page are two items, a timer (to the left) and an AdCounter (to the right).
The timer counts down 7 seconds. During this period you cannot move to the next ad, but only after the timer hits 0. Remember that.
The AdCounter simply shows you the number of adverts you\'ve seen in the day.
Below the AdCards are buttons which can help you do more cool stuff.
Feedback Button : This button helps you pass suggestions or opinions about the app.
Ad Archive Button : This will open a window where you can view all your pinned ads.
Dashboard Button : This window is where all the stats concerning the number of ads you\'ve see are stored.
Share App Button : This will help you share the app with your friends and mates. Feel free to do so!
Share! and if you have any questions comments or suggestions, contact us through feedback (in the dashboard).
No it is optional, meaning you do not have to engage in it if you don\'t want to.
Its quite simple really. Essentially you will be monetised based on (and in proportion to) the number of ads you see.
Advertising in the AdCafe is one of the simplest and most convenient way to advertise, as it has many benefits that help you promote your product.
Essentially, we only advertise by views. When our user sees a banner for 7 seconds, we consider advertising to have taken place.
Also, advertising here happens in 24h cycles; Meaning, when you upload an ad today, it will only be showcased on the day after.
Advertising here gives you the ability to reach the apps users within a very short period of time.
Here you can target the type of users you want to reach based on the general category of product you deal with.
Advertising here is affordable and flexible as per your financial ability. The price, however, is dependent on the price your targeted users charge for their time.
In the event your ad doesn\'t reach your targeted number of users, you can take back the remaining amount through the Ad Stats Window.
Through the Ad Stats Window(Dashboard->Ad Stats), you can find out in real time how many users have seen your ad and the amount to be reimbursed.
The page is designed similar to the main page. This basically will give you a feel of how the banner will look in real time.
Below the mock card are a few buttons which will help you select and upload your ad.
Select Image button : This button will help you choose an image from your gallery.
Select Number of People button : This is for choosing the number of people you want to reach.
Add link button : (Optional) You can ad a link to a relevant website for your advert.
Upload button : After setting everything, clicking this button will prompt you for your payment details then after making the payment, the upload will be done.
We have a strict policy concerning re-uploading ads. Uploading the same ad more than once is not allowed here.
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions, inquiries or issues you may have. If you need further clarification on the advertising process, please contact us.
Note: The higher the amount chosen, the lower the number of banners you might see. So we recommend 3 Ksh per view.
Press continue if you wish to change the amount you charge for each banner you see.
Remember: The higher the amount chosen, the lower the number of banners you might see. So we recommend 3 Ksh per view.
Hey, check out this cool new app called The AdCafé.
Click continue if you wish to change the time you are notified daily about new ads.
Next you need to make a payment before the upload. We only support Mpesa payments for now.
We also need a few more details from you before we can continue.
The cost of advertising here depends on the amount charged by the group of users you are targeting. For instance, some users charge 3Ksh per view.

So if you were to target the 3Ksh users, you would pay 5000Ksh per 1000 users reached
i.e 3Ksh + 2Ksh per user reached.

We charge 2Ksh on top of the amount charged by the users, for every user reached
(thus the 3Ksh + 2Ksh). Remember that.
The Ad Stats Window can help you monitor and perform actions on your uploaded ads in real time.
The take down button is for taking down an ad uploaded if you need to do so. You can only take the ad on the day you uploaded it.
Only visible the day after showcasing the ad, the reimburse button gives you the option to obtain the remaining amount for the targeted users not reached.
Click the proceed button if you wish to withdraw your money totals into your mobile account. We only support MPesa payouts as of now.
Click the proceed button if you wish for us to reimburse you the remaining amount to your mobile account. We only support MPesa reimbursements for now.
We only need your phone number, email and your account password to make the payout.
Note: We do not store any of your credit/debit card information for security reasons.
That ad may have been taken down by the admin and cannot be put back up.We will contact you for more details via your email.
We can send you a password reset email. After resetting, the changes will take effect in a couple of moments.
However we may need to log you out of your account.
Something unexpected occurred while making the payments. Perhaps your card was declined.
Please contact your bank and resolve this issue then come back and retry.
We only need your phone number and email to continue. You\'ll then be redirected to the sim-card app for your mpesa password and the payment will be completed.
You should be redirected to your Sim Tool Kit app requesting for your Mpesa password then the payment will be completed.
When the payment is done, the upload should automatically begin.
If you wish to restart the payment, just click the Restart Payment Button.
Something may have gone wrong while making the payouts. Just try again after a few of minutes.
The payout has been completed. You should receive a notification soon from Mpesa about your received amount.
You may have mistyped your email and/or password. The app is having a hard time authenticating you.
We may not be able to continue with some of the details you\'ve passed. Perhaps that email is already in use.
Please don\'t forget your password. You\'ll need it in the app.
"Note: You'll need a internet connection at the set time to load any notifications."
"Are you sure you want to save this to your device's storage?"
"The image will be in a 'AdCafePins' folder."

In order to show you more relevant content, the app can filter the content you see based on further advertiser targeting. To achieve this, however, you may be required to provide some personal info about yourself.
Do note though, that not all the info listed is mandatory.
Some advertisers may wish to target specific users based on certain criteria. Therefore, to see even more content, you will be required to provide the app your information to make this possible.
First, your preferred gender/sex.
Next, your age. Click the calendar icon to select your birhtday.
"Finally, your area of location. Here, click on the map icon to drop pins on the areas you generally reside in such as work, school or home areas."

We value your privacy as much as you do. Therefore, your provided information will not be shared with third party organisation. We will try our best to keep all your information safe and secure to the best of our ability.
Do you wish for the app to stop filtering content based on your provided personal data?
Do you wish for the app to start filtering content based on your provided personal data?

The app allows for you to perform further targeting based on criteria such as age groups, sex/gender, and user locations. To do so, click continue. To delete previously set target preferences, click reset.

"By adding further targeted preferences, you're essentially filtering your audience based on the selected preferences. So if a user doesn't meet your specified conditions fully, they will not engage your ad."
You can filter your audience based on their preferred sex/gender.
You can also filter your audience based on a specific age range, for instance users aged from 19 to 25.

You may also filter your audience to only users within a given area or location. To do this, click on the map icon and drop markers on your targeted location. Only users residing in a 2000 meter radius of the marker will engage the ad.
Check that all the details are right before finishing.
Feedback Type
Suggestion
Gripe
Praise
Bug
Question
